name: Frontline Ltd.
description: Frontline Ltd. is one of the world's largest independent oil tanker shipping companies, specializing in the transportation of crude oil and refined petroleum products. Established in 1996 and headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda, Frontline operates a modern fleet of crude oil tankers, including very large crude carriers (VLCCs) and Suezmax tankers. The company is committed to providing reliable and efficient transportation services while adhering to the highest safety and environmental standards. Frontline's fleet is equipped with advanced technology to ensure optimal performance and reduced environmental impact, positioning the company as a leader in the shipping industry. Frontline is focused on meeting the needs of its clients, which include major oil companies and traders, by offering flexible and scalable shipping solutions. The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange and has a strong presence in the global shipping market. Frontline's strategic initiatives include fleet modernization, investment in eco-friendly technologies, and expanding its operational capabilities to adapt to the evolving demands of the maritime and energy sectors.

key_executives.name: Lars B. E. B. B. M. H. B. R. S. K. K. M.

seo.meta_title: Frontline Ltd. | Leading Oil Tanker Shipping Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Frontline Ltd., a leading independent oil tanker shipping company specializing in the transportation of crude oil and refined products. Learn about our modern fleet and commitment to safety and efficiency.

faq.question: What does Frontline Ltd. do?
faq.answer: Frontline Ltd. specializes in the transportation of crude oil and refined petroleum products through its fleet of oil tankers.

faq.question: Where is Frontline headquartered?
faq.answer: Frontline is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Frontline?
faq.answer: The CEO of Frontline Ltd. is Robert Hvide Macleod.
